intro.title: Our Services
intro.text: We provide flexible, high-quality solutions for your home or office. From small repairs to full-scale renovations – we’re with you every step of the way.

rightlist.1: Professional execution of full or partial interior renovation projects.
rightlist.2: Modern and functional upgrades for bathrooms and kitchens.
rightlist.3: Drywall installation, partitioning, hidden lighting, and decorative structures.
rightlist.4: High-quality painting, wall preparation, and plastering work.
rightlist.5: Installation of laminate, tile, parquet, and other types of flooring.
rightlist.6: Electrical and plumbing installation or replacement by licensed professionals.
rightlist.7: Interior and exterior insulation for energy efficiency and protection.
